Package view_controller

package view_controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AttemptView
    AttemptView extends BordePane and implements MyObserver, it has instance variables that keep track of username, gridPane, funcPane, welcomeLabel, myButtons, currentButtonIndex, and isOver.
    ConfettiEffect
    The ConfettiEffect class represents a visual effect of confetti falling down on the screen.
    KeyboardView
    This class represents the view for the keyboard in the Wordle game.
    LoginView
    This class represents the view for the login screen of the application.
    Main
    The class Main which extends Application will implement Wordle It uses several view such as loginView, attemptView, keyboardView It also prompts the user for credential to start playing the game in attemptView Main also includes a Menu bar that allows to customize the style, log out, check statistics, and ask for help
    StatsViewV2
    This class create statistics view for Wordle Game.
